about.title: About Me
about.desc1: I'm a passionate web application developer focused on building performant, modern and scalable web apps. I care about clean code, smooth user experiences, and continuous learning. I'm especialized in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, tailwind css. I have knowledge ofthe full lificycle of applications, including BE languages like Java.
about.desc2: When I’m not coding, I’m exploring new technologies, improving my UI/UX skills, or working on side projects that challenge me to grow. Currently looking for a job.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.desc: Currently open to new projects and looking for new job opportunities.
